ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Trade skill upgrades
ygData.msgSnippet: Just another update in case you havent read up.... in a chat that you can read @ the casters realm there is a bit about tinkering... here, read the tinkering
ygData.messageBody:
Just another update in case you havent read up.... in a chat that you can read @ the casters realm there is a bit about tinkering... here, read the tinkering bits...
 
Yakatizma: There's a small fishing upgrade that is in the coming patch and we have plans for a bigger variety of fish to catch. Fletching will get an upgrade but it's a complicated one so it may not be before Velious. I'm saving a lot of the Tinkering ideas for Velious as well.
 
TGnome: Will the Gnome only race armor, which I understand has a tinkering component, have any procs/effects like normal tinkered items?
 
Yakatizma: I've been designing a couple variations of it. For it to be truly a gnomish marvel of mechanics it would naturally have some sort of purpose other than just fashion or protection
Yakatizma: There's been some really good suggestions for gnomish firearms but Everquest may be just a bit to high fantasy for them
TGnome: One common question I'm getting, is there/will there ever be a use for the gemcutter?
 
TGnome: Thanks yak!
 
Yakatizma: Good question, we'll find some use for that contraption some day
 
Cogg - RZ
